head.title: Adobo Sauce [If I Understand My Chiles]

ing.item: Dried ancho chiles; stems and seeds removed [really Pasilla chiles]
Dried Pasilla; stem and seeds removed [really negro chiles]

directions.step:
From: mariusj@best.com (Marius Johnston)
Date: Wed, 31 Jul 1996 21:29:22 -0700 Cover chiles with hot water, let sit for 15 min. Combine chiles, and 1/4 to 1/2 cup of the water they were soaking in, onion, garlic, oregano and cumin in a blender and puree. Saute the mixture in oil for 5 min add vinegar and sugar and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, simmer until thick about 5-8 min.
Notes: Erica Wissolik <EWISSOLIK@crs.loc.gov> From the Chile-Heads Recipe Collection URL: http://chile.ucdmc.ucdavis.edu:8000/www/recipe.html
